div.p: ALADIN-HIRLAM numerical weather prediction system is developed in cooperation between the ALADIN and HIRLAM consortia and not available to general public. A copy of the source code of the ALADIN-HIRLAM numerical weather prediction system could be obtained for non-commercial research purposes from a member institution of ALADIN or HIRLAM consortium in applicant’s country after signing a standardised license agreement ( http://www.hirlam.org/index.php/hirlam-programme-53/access-to-the-models).
